## Git and GitHub
 * Git: Version-control system
 * GitHub: a free hosting service for git repositories.
 
## Verify Installation

There should be a version below the following code chunk. If there is not, please install git from [here](https://git-scm.com/).

```{bash include=TRUE}
git --version
```
